definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: In this paper, the technological conditions of acorn bean jelly are mainly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 主要探讨了橡子凉粉的生产工艺参数和配方。

sentences.english: Buckwheat Bean has a high nutritional and medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 苦荞凉粉具有较高的营养和药用价值。

sentences.english: And in winter, there is hot bean jelly prepared for you.
sentences.chinese: 而冬天有专门的热凉粉出售。

sentences.english: Chengde area residents have been eating grass jelly, more than 300 years of history.
sentences.chinese: 承德一带居民食用凉粉已有300多年的历史。

definition: Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
buckwheat pudding (snack of buckwheat noodles with sauce)
noodles either made of buckwheat or sorghum
